lead_paragraph: The case of a mother who killed herself and her four children has ignited concerns about the grim realities rural families face amid rampant inequality.

headline.print_headline: China’s Poverty Seen as Reason Mother Killed Her 4 Children
headline.main: Mother’s Killing of Children in Rural China Spurs Debate About Inequality

snippet: The case of a mother who killed herself and her four children has ignited concerns about the grim realities rural families face amid rampant inequality....
abstract: Poverty is cited as motive for murder-suicide in rural village in northwestern China; young mother Yang Gailan poisoned her three daughters and son before taking her own life; crime highlights extreme financial struggles faced by many rural Chinese families as increasing number of residents leave for employment in more prosperous cities.
